description: A 16 year-old first year high school student who temporarily fills in as an assistant for SPR to repay her debt when she accidentally injures Naru`s regular assistant, Lin, and breaks a camera that was being used in an investigation of an old building at Mai`s school. After the conclusion of the first case, she is offered a regular part-time position for SPR and acts as an office and on-case assistant for SPR after developing an interest in the handsome boss of SPR, Shibuya Kazuya who she nicknames Naru for his narcissism.
name: Taniyama Mai
